mainContent.heading: What is the About Us Page Section?
paragraphs: The About Us Page Section is a flexible Shopify section designed to help you present your brand story in a clear and engaging way.
It allows you to showcase your mission, values, and key highlights using a structured layout that combines images and text for better storytelling.
This section integrates smoothly into any storefront and is ideal for brands looking to build credibility and connect with their audience.

features.title: Item Layout
features.description: Control how many items appear per row, along with spacing and alignment.

features.title: Image Styling
features.description: Adjust image size, shape, alignment, and borders to match your brand.

features.title: Color & Background
features.description: Customize background colors, text colors, and borders for visual consistency.

features.title: Text Styling
features.description: Manage fonts, sizes, spacing, and alignment for all text content.
